item.title: 区块链技术助力实现直接股票借贷
item.description: 基于区块链的贷款机构Figure Technology Solutions Inc.正推出全新平台发行链上股权，使投资者能够绕过传统中介机构直接向彼此出借股票。【原文：Blockchain-based lender Figure Technology Solutions Inc. is launching a new platform to issue on-chain equity, allowing investors to lend shares directly to one another without traditional intermediaries.】

item.title: Lucid将于2026年在沙特阿拉伯启动汽车生产
item.description: Lucid集团公司正按计划推进在沙特阿拉伯投产汽车的进程，旨在助力该国打造本土汽车制造中心并减少进口的雄心。【原文：Lucid Group Inc. is on track with plans to start producing cars in Saudi Arabia as it looks to drive the kingdom’s ambitions to create a domestic auto manufacturing hub and cut down on imports.】

item.title: 摩尔多瓦总理德拉古认为该国已准备好迎接大型国际贷款机构
item.description: 摩尔多瓦央行行长表示，该国正准备迎接一家大型国际贷款机构进入其银行体系。此前该国银行业经历了改革，该行业十年前曾因一场丑闻动荡不安，导致国家濒临破产。【原文：Moldova’s central bank governor said the country is preparing for a big international lender to enter its banking system following reforms to the sector, which was rocked by a scandal that left the nation on the verge of bankruptcy a decade ago.】

item.title: 摩根大通财报发布后启动美国大型银行债券发售计划
item.description: 摩根大通公司正进军美国高评级债券市场，这标志着银行财报季后债券发售洪流的开启。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is tapping the US high-grade market, the start of the typical deluge of bank bond sales following earnings.】

item.title: 共和党要员称鲍威尔或缺席国会听证会
item.description: 据一位关键共和党议员透露，由于司法部向美联储发出传票，美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔可能缺席下次预定的国会听证会。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell may skip his next scheduled appearance before Congress because of subpoenas served on the central bank by the Department of Justice, according to a key Republican lawmaker.】

item.title: 美国生产商获得的价格因能源成本飙升而上涨
item.description: 美国11月批发通胀率较上月小幅上升，主要受能源成本飙升推动，尽管服务类价格保持不变。【原文：US wholesale inflation picked up slightly in November from a month earlier on a jump in energy costs, even as prices for services were unchanged.】

item.title: 波兰维持利率不变以评估2025年宽松政策的影响
item.description: 波兰央行自6月以来首次维持利率不变，决策者正评估数月货币宽松政策对物价的影响。【原文：Poland’s central bank held interest rates steady for first time since June as policymakers gauged the impact of months of monetary easing on prices.】

item.title: 美国零售额因购车和假日季销售反弹
item.description: 美国11月零售额录得7月以来最大增幅，主要得益于汽车购买的反弹和节日购物的强劲表现。【原文：US retail sales rose in November by the most since July, fueled by a rebound in auto purchases and resilient holiday shopping.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克称美核合作或促成西屋交易
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特·菲科表示，该国预计将于周五与美国签署核能合作协议，为明年与西屋电气公司达成核电站协议铺平道路。【原文：Slovakia expects to sign a nuclear cooperation agreement with the US on Friday, paving the way for a power-plant deal with Westinghouse Electric Co. next year, Prime Minister Robert Fico said.】

item.title: 波兰密切关注特朗普对美联储的调查，以制定美元债券发售计划
item.description: 波兰正密切关注美国总统特朗普对美联储展开调查可能引发的市场动荡，这个投资级主权国家正考虑在今年晚些时候发行美元债券。【原文：Poland is closely watching for any market fallout from US President Donald Trump’s investigation into the Federal Reserve as the investment-grade sovereign considers issuing debt in dollars later this year.】

item.title: 对冲基金人才出走潮：ExodusPoint聘请前高盛、法国巴黎银行外汇专家
item.description: 据知情人士透露，出埃及点资本管理公司已聘请经验丰富的期权交易员巴里斯·特梅尔库兰担任宏观投资组合经理。【原文：ExodusPoint Capital Management has hired seasoned options trader Baris Temelkuran as a macro portfolio manager, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 爱彼迎任命Meta生成式人工智能负责人为首席技术官
item.description: 爱彼迎公司已聘请前Meta Platforms公司高管担任其新任首席技术官。这家短期租赁公司正投入资金，计划在今年将更多人工智能和个性化元素融入其服务中。【原文：Airbnb Inc. has hired a former Meta Platforms Inc. executive as its new chief technology officer, as the short-term rental company is investing to include more artificial intelligence and personalization elements into its service this year.】

item.title: 纽伯格伯曼以70亿美元估值投资Ryan公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，纽伯格伯曼公司正收购Ryan LLC的少数股权，此次交易对这家税务咨询与软件供应商的估值约为70亿美元。【原文：Neuberger Berman is buying a minority stake in Ryan LLC, valuing the tax advisory and software provider at about $7 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 机器人初创企业Skild AI在新一轮融资中估值突破140亿美元
item.description: Skild AI公司是一家快速崛起的初创企业，致力于开发帮助机器人学习完成任务的软件。该公司最新融资轮已筹集约14亿美元，估值突破140亿美元，较七个月前增长逾三倍。【原文：Skild AI Inc., a fast-rising startup that makes software to help robots learn to complete tasks, has secured about $1.4 billion in a new funding round that values the company at more than $14 billion, more than triple what it was worth just seven months ago.】

item.title: 欧洲央行发现：欧洲自身贸易壁垒比特朗普的更严苛
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的研究显示，欧盟内部的贸易摩擦造成的负担，比美国总统特朗普去年威胁对欧盟征收的最高关税还要沉重。【原文：Trade frictions across the European Union are more onerous than the highest tariff US President Donald Trump threatened to slap on the bloc last year, according to research by the European Central Bank.】

item.title: 欧佩克对2027年的初步展望显示需求将保持稳定增长
item.description: 欧佩克对2027年全球石油需求前景的首次详细评估显示，全球石油需求将保持稳定增长态势。【原文：OPEC’s first detailed assessment of 2027 projects that global oil demand will continue to increase at a steady pace.】

item.title: 加拿大央行行长卡尼抵达北京，中国敦促取消关税
item.description: 加拿大总理马克·卡尼周三抵达北京，开启八年来首位加拿大国家元首的国事访问。与此同时，中国官方媒体呼吁渥太华取消对中国出口商品的关税。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney landed in Beijing on Wednesday for the first state visit from a Canadian leader in eight years, as Chinese state media called on Ottawa to lift tariffs on the nation’s exports.】

item.title: 悬挂俄罗斯国旗的油轮遭美国扣押后抵达英国水域
item.description: 一艘悬挂俄罗斯国旗的油轮驶入英国领海——此前数日，该船曾在大西洋被美军扣押。【原文：An oil tanker sailing under the flag of Russia arrived in UK territorial waters — days after it was seized in the Atlantic Ocean by US forces.】

item.title: 奥地利通过食品和能源价格补贴应对通胀差距
item.description: 奥地利深陷困境的执政联盟达成了一系列减税和补贴措施，旨在降低企业和家庭的成本。政府此举旨在抑制通胀，同时遏制右翼民族主义者在民调中的强势上升。【原文：Austria’s embattled coalition agreed on a set of tax cuts and subsidies designed to lower costs for businesses and households, as the government tries to temper inflation and blunt a surge in polls for right-wing nationalists.】

item.title: 新兴市场股市创下新高，亚洲科技股领涨
item.description: 新兴市场股票连续第三日上涨，再创历史新高，主要得益于亚洲科技股的强劲表现。【原文：Emerging-market stocks rose for the third-straight day to touch yet another record high, driven mainly by the boom in Asian technology shares.】

item.title: 油价暴跌后，大型石油公司为利润下滑做准备
item.description: 超级石油巨头们可能正面临更艰难的财报季。【原文：The supermajors may be heading into a tougher earnings season.】

item.title: 太平洋投资管理公司称新兴市场涨势将持续"数年"
item.description: 对于全球最大的债券管理公司之一而言，去年席卷新兴市场的涨势只是更持久趋势的前奏。【原文：For one of the world’s largest bond managers, the rally that swept through emerging markets last year was a prelude to a longer-lasting trend.】

item.title: 保加利亚股市因加入欧元区于2026年初成为全球表现最佳股市
item.description: 保加利亚央行副行长彼得·乔巴诺夫表示，该国加入欧元区正推动2026年初全球股市迎来最强劲涨势，并可能助力进一步提升该国主权信用评级。【原文：Bulgaria’s euro adoption is fueling the world’s best stock rally in early 2026 and may help further improve the sovereign’s credit rating, according to Peter Chobanov, a deputy central bank governor.】

item.title: 特朗普最新关税威胁加剧关税混乱
item.description: 对于处理美国关税支付和文书工作的报关行而言，这项工作变得复杂得多。【原文：For customs brokers who handle US tariff payments and paperwork, the job just got a lot more complicated】

item.title: 亚马逊在芝加哥大幅扩大实体零售布局
item.description: 这家电子商务巨头正在扩大与消费者的接触。【原文：The e-commerce leader is broadening its contact with consumers.】

item.title: 市场何时开始关注美联储独立性
item.description: 各国央行行长对特朗普政府施压美联储的行动感到困扰。迄今为止，市场对此的担忧程度较低，但这种情况可能发生变化。【原文：Central bankers are vexed by the Trump administration’s pressure campaign on the Fed. Markets have so far been less worried, but that could change.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率跌至2022年以来最低水平之一
item.description: 上周美国抵押贷款利率跌至数年来的最低水平之一，引发购房和再融资活动激增，为疲软的房地产市场带来希望。【原文：US mortgage rates slid last week to one of the lowest levels in years, sparking a flurry of purchase and refinancing activity that offers hope for a plodding housing market.】

item.title: 金属价格反弹势头在2026年初加速
item.description:
金属市场中动物精神依然旺盛，多重因素正推动价格飙升

【原文：

Animal spirits are alive and well in metals markets as several factors fuel the price surge

】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔支持的Quantinuum即将提交IPO申请
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由霍尼韦尔国际公司控股的量子计算企业Quantinuum计划近期提交首次公开募股申请。【原文：Quantinuum, the quantum computing company controlled by Honeywell International Inc., is planning to file for an initial public offering imminently, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据称汇丰考虑出售新加坡保险业务
item.description: 知情人士透露，汇丰控股有限公司正考虑对其新加坡保险业务进行重组，包括出售该业务。此前，在首席执行官乔治·埃尔赫德里领导下，汇丰已在全球范围内推进其他业务重组计划。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc is exploring options for its insurance unit in Singapore, including a sale, people familiar with the matter said, following other business revamps globally under Chief Executive Officer Georges Elhedery.】
